# model

**Instance Property**

The underlying Core ML model of the word tagger.

## Declaration

```swift
var model: MLModel { get set }
```

## Describing a word tagger

- **description**: A text representation of the word tagger.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the word tagger that’s suitable for output during debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the word tagger in a playground.
